page.title: 18TRANSPORT IN DIPTON.
page.content:
{Public Transport in our area is in the {form of buses belonging mainly to the {Northern General Bus Co.& some private {operators like Watsons & Hunter Bros. {These buses travel through our village {to the main towns such as Consett, {Stanley,Newcastle,& Durham.The maj. of {children in our block travel to school {by bus.Others use cars,taxis,or walk.
As we have no railway station here,we must go to Durham or Newcastle if we wish to catch a Train to any part of the country.....by LISA THOMPSON. { {Survey of 100 MEN & 100 WOMEN in block
Do you own a car? YES............52.5% {If so,how many?...91 people had 1..... What was the top make?..FORD.....25% {Have you flown by aeroplane?.YES.55%.. Have you sailed by ship?.....YES.70%..
